home.title: Welcome
home.text: On this page I will collect all the information / projects that I am doing, most of them related to Furry Fandom

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: Here I will show you all the projects I have done, and the ones I am working on. I usually create Discord bots and simple terminal programs

fursona.text: Teko is an arctic fox with blue hair and green&yellow eyes. He has ice powers and can use them to create objects made of ice.
fursona.name: Name

dislikes.title: Dislike
dislikes.value: Noisy people, crowds and hot places

about.title: About
about.text2: I'm Teko, a computer engineering student from Spain.
about.text3: I am a learning computer engineer and programmer, who likes to code simple projects like Discord bots or this webpage.
about.text4: Besides that I also enjoy photography and drawing furries and cute stuff.
about.subtitle: Redes Sociales

experimental.title: Experimental
experimental.text: In this page there are some experiments for this webpage. They are currently being tested, so they might not work for you.

presentation.title: Hello, I'm Teko and arctic foxxo
presentation.text: I love waffles, photography and programming
